  • Methodendetails

    • getTextureFromRegion

      public Texture getTextureFromRegion(Vector2D position, Vector2D size)
      The function "getTextureFromRegion" takes in a position and size and retrieves a texture from a specified region.
      Parameter:
      position - The position parameter is a Vector2D object that represents the position of the region from which the texture is to be retrieved. From the top-left point of the image.
      size - The size of the region from which to get the texture.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      The `dispose()` method is used to release any resources or memory used by the `Texture` object.
      Angegeben von:
      dispose in Schnittstelle Disposable

    • getSpritesheetImageRef

      public Object getSpritesheetImageRef()
      The function returns the reference to an image object.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning the value of the variable `spritesheetImageRef`, which is of type `Object`.

    • setSpritesheetImageRef

      public void setSpritesheetImageRef(Object spritesheetImageRef)
      This function sets the image reference for an object.
      Parameter:
      spritesheetImageRef - The parameter "spritesheetImageRef" is an object that represents a reference to an image.

    • getSize

      public ImmutableVector2D getSize()
      The function returns an immutable 2D size object.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning an object of type `ImmutableSize2D`.

      public SpritesheetTextureManager getSpritesheetTextureManager()
